# English to French Translation Services Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Solicitation Information

*   **Title:** English to French Translation Services for the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Reference Number:** cb-470-21069820
*   **Amendment Number:** 6
*   **Solicitation Number:** N24-20230570A
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-02-27
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-08T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-04-08

## Background

The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) is seeking to establish up to three (3) contracts for first-rate English to French translation services. These services will be delivered on an as-and-when-required basis, often with tight deadlines.

## Objectives

*   Provide high-quality English to French translation services
*   Meet tight deadlines
*   Deliver services on an as-and-when-required basis

## Services Required

*   English to French translation services
*   Translation of various documents, including reports, articles, and research papers
*   Delivery of services on an as-and-when-required basis
*   Meeting tight deadlines

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Technical Merit (40%)
*   Price (30%)
*   Past Performance (30%)

## Proposal Requirements

Proposals must be submitted electronically to Tenders@NSERC-CRSNG.GC.CA no later than April 8, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST. Proposals should include:

*   Company profile and experience
*   Translation services offered
*   Rates and pricing structure
*   Project plan and timeline
*   References and past performance

## Additional Information

*   A tender notice URL is not available.
*   This solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers.
*   The contracting authority is the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC).

The evaluation process will be based on the evaluation criteria mentioned above. The selection will be made by the NSERC Language Services team.

Note that the translated document must meet the government's translation quality standards.

## Closing

The tender closing date is April 8, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST
